An average scientist slaughters thousands of marines, aliens, and super soldiers without any military experience.
10/10 love this game

The original Half-Life redefined FPS games forever. This sequel did the same thing. It is amazing how much time Valve put into this game to make it an unforgettable experience. The game keeps you immersed all the time, with a perfect introduction to the Half-Life world. We get characters that are very likable, and a story that is easy to follow. Gordon Freeman returns to save the world from an alien empire known as the Combine. This game also introduces new physics, so you can pick up things. Also, for the 4 years they kept this game in development, they improved the graphics A LOT. This game still looks good to this day! 

The gameplay is similar to the first game, shoot down enemies, solve puzzles, and jump around. Though the weapons are not as cool and creative as the first game, there are some pretty new and cool weapons introduced in this one. First, we have a high accuracy assault rifle that can also shoot balls of energy that disintegrates people. And then we have the most memorable weapon - the gravity gun. A gun that lets you pick up items and launch them at anyone, a pretty badass weapon that you'll find yourself using a lot. Another complaint with the gameplay is similar to what I said about the weapons. Not many cool and creative enemies. The main enemy you fight are just Combine soldiers with different clothes and weapons. Their AI is not as great as the Soldiers from the original game. I can't take the Combine seriously in this game, as they just let me shoot them down, making this game really easy.

Next, the levels. The levels in this game are my favorite part. Every level is so different from each other. One time, you are escaping a zombie infested town. And then, you are controlling creatures with an alien testacle to break out of a prison. The levels are insane, and always feels like you are playing something different each time. Though I think the "Water Hazard" chapter was still good, it was the most confusing chapter to navigate through in my opinion. Towards the end, something amazing and satisfying is given to you, making your journey even more cooler.

Overall, Half-Life 2 is an amazing game that every gamer should experience. It is a game that has aged really well, unlike the first (sorry Half-Life 1 fans), and even modern gamers can still enjoy this game. The experience is immersive, the characters you interact with are great, every level is different. And, you have a gravity gun (and your Crowbar!!). If I were to give this game a rating out of 10, it would be 9.5/10, probably one of the best games i've ever played.
Decent graphics even in 2018. Gameplay is even beyond some 2018 games. 10/10

Goddamn Half-life 2, this game was so fun to play! the story, the characters, the gameplay, just *Satisfied noises*

So lets talk about it!

Story - Kicks right off with G-man telling you what happend and what is going to happen. Very fun to follow and just to listen too and just extremely interesting 10/10

Gameplay - Alot of crowbar-ing, piercing with crossbow bars and such. the guns were really cool, and it wasnt boring i'd Give it a 10/10.

Graphics - Very nice graphics...but..yeah, the light kinda messed up when i got to elis lab..and it just hurt my eyes, i had to take several breaks. 6/10.

PROS / CONS

Pros :
- Addicting Gameplay
- Cool Gunplay
- Fast Paced shooting
- Throwing toilets with the gravitron at enemies.
- Doing the achievements

Cons :
- The Light issue at elis lab - till the end

The game is just straight away a Get it!

Before i played this game, i didn't understand the hype and thought this game is wayy overrated. But holy shit, after I play I can say that it's one of the most amazing single player experience yet. I can't just put it into words, like the combat is quite smooth, the level design is really good and doesn't hold your hand by pointing direction arrows like other games but at the same time it's pretty clear on what to do. Eventhough the graphic is a bit outdated, the game felt really atmospheric. My favourite level in this game, strangely enough, is Ravenholm. I really like the suspense and the horror aspect of it. I could remeber clearly that one time where the headcrab zombie walked through the fire and screams in agony before it died on my feet. I reccomend you guys wait during sale and grab this for a dollar
for a game that is 14 years old, it is pretty good. It has great puzzles and a great story

В этой игре, меня не волновало много смертей, кроме  [b] одной [/b] . . .
Это был очередной штурм
Я спокойно уничтожал отряды врагов
И тут... я увидел ЕЁ
[spoiler] Турель... [/spoiler]
[u] Она не стреляла в меня [/u] , я полюбил её как только увидел
Я проносил её через всю вражескую базу, сражаясь против толп противников вместе с ней.
И вот... [spoiler] Телепорт [/spoiler] я держал оборону вместе с ее друзьями, когда портал зарядился
Я побежал к ней, надеясь вытащить отсюда.... Но она оттолкнула меня.. и сказала уходить отсюда..
 В последний миг меня затащила Алекс в [spoiler] Телепорт [/spoiler] И на моих глазах, турель держала оборону против толп противников..
Я видел что она осталась одна... её окружили, она посмотрела на меня и улыбнулась, закрыв глаза.
И в последний миг в неё прилетела граната... и меня  [spoiler] телепортировало [/spoiler]  
Я поклялся отомстить за неё.

A mute scientist turns into Rambo and defeats the Earth-ending regime of his former boss who he used to work for at some research facility in New Mexico by killing the enemy with toilets, barrels, oversized nopes with wings, a crane, and a rusty tool consisting of a metal bar with a single curved end and flattened points, with a small fissure on both ends for removing nails. I would seriously advise never to allow him behind the wheel of a vehicle unless you wanted him to run someone over or enjoy sitting upside down in one. I believe guns are in the game as well.

I rate this game a solid 5/7.

P.S. If the thought of your SO being too clingy and never giving you any privacy ever crossed your mind, thank baby Jesus in his manger tonight that they at least don't share the physical characteristics of a headcrab.

this game is one of my all time favorites. i have sunk hours into this game over nearly 5 years at this point i believe. everything about this game is amazing from how fun the combat is (it is incredibly fun to run over buildings civil protection stand on during the air-boat section as well as just how good it feels to shoot guns in general) to how well the atmosphere is (i still get a great sense of dread when i enter city-17 every time i play this game)

one main critique i have about it though is that some of the levels can drag on for too long, most notably the air-boat section. i feel as though everything between getting the helicopter gun on the airboat and the helicopter boss fight should've been chopped or shortened.

Русский вариант обзора:

1998 год. HALF-LIFE шокирует игровую индустрию сочетанием напряженного действия и непрерывного, затягивающего сюжета. Дебютная игра Valve завоевала свыше 50 наград «Игра года» на пути к получению титула «Лучшая игра для РС всех времен» от PC Gamer; 

Игра в целом мне понравилась. Понравилась она мне в том, что в ней есть сюжет, и сюжет глубокий.  Пересказывать не буду. Рекомендую в покупке этой игры. Я сам покупал ее на СКИДКАХ за 24 рубля (0,39 USD).  Как не как это шутер.  Игра  стоит  своих денег.  Также в игре присутствует мильтиплеер, ну как мультиплеер он в виде дополнения, которое называется Synergy. ССЫЛКА на Synergy ( http://store.steampowered.com/app/17520/Synergy/ ).Так же в игре присутствуют миссии, над которыми нужно реально мыслино подумать. Half-Life 2 это мир, в котором присутствие игрока влияет на все, что его окружает — от физической среды до поведения и даже эмоций как друзей, так и врагов.  Попадая в этот мир вы будете переживать, то что переживает ваш персонаж Гордон Фримен .И главное в игре есть физика: все объекты, начиная с пущенной по воде гальки и заканчивая двухтонными грузовиками, ведут себя естественно, полностью повинуясь законам физики с учетом массы, трения, силы тяжести и плавучести. 

 Подеведем итоги:
 1) Интересный игровой сюжет.
2)Есть мультиплеер (Synergy)
3)Игра застовляет думать.
4)Отличная графика для 2004 года !!!

Спасибо за внимание !



The English version of the review:

1998. HALF-LIFE shocks the gaming industry with a combination of intense action and continuous, immersive storytelling. Valve's debut game has won over 50 Game of the year awards on its way to being named best PC game of all time by PC Gamer; 

The game as a whole I liked it. Liked she me in is, that in it there is the plot, and the plot deep.  I will not retell. I recommend buying this game. I bought it at a DISCOUNT for 24 rubles (0,39 USD). It's a shooter.  The game is worth the money.  Also, the game has miltiplayer well as multiplayer it in Supplement form, which is called Synergy. Link to Synergy ( http://store.steampowered.com/app/17520/Synergy/). The game also has missions that require really myslina to think. Half-Life 2 is a world in which the player's presence affects everything around him — from the physical environment to the behavior and even the emotions of both friends and enemies.  Getting into this world you will experience what is going through your character Gordon Freeman .And the main thing in the game is physics: all objects, from the pebbles started up on water and finishing with two-ton trucks, behave naturally, completely obeying the laws of physics taking into account the mass, friction, gravity and buoyancy. 

 Let's sum up:
 1) Interesting game plot.
2)There is multiplayer (Synergy)
3) the Game freezes thinking.
4) Excellent graphics for 2004 !!! 

Thank you for your attention !

Игра ничем не отличается от первой части, т.к такая же тупая стрелялка без сюжета... Думал я первые 3 часа игры, которые являются самыми скучными и тошнотворными, и их надо просто перетерпеть. Но потом игра налилась красками и экшончиком, и даже начал вылазить тот самый хваленый сюжет ( неужели я его дождался ). Графика в игре для 2004 года отличная, а если еще бесплатный мод из стима на графу поставить, то вообще огонь. Сюжет начинается спустя 20 лет после 1 части, но Фримен не постарел ни на год, т.к он был заморожен. Позже вы встретите старых друзей из Черной Мезы ( кто из них кто догадывайтесь сами, ибо в первой части у всех ученых было всего 2 модельки, а тут у каждого своя)) ) В итоге узнаем, что ученый ЧМ тут за главного на Земле с точки зрения Альянса, а другой важный дед из ЧМ создал свою " народную армию ", на стороне которой мы и будем. Концовка снова непонятная, игру опять заканчивает G-man. Игруля опять получилась длинной, проходится за +-12/13 часов. В общем поиграть можно, если потом не боитесь ждать хл3 до конца жизни.
ГДЕ РУССКИЙ ЯЗЫК?
Далеко не так впечатляюще, как в те далекие годы. Затянутые уровни, однообразные механики, в общем старуха, золоты дни которой далеко позади.

HλLF-LIFE2 it's a sequel to 1998's Half-Life, a first-person shooter created by Valve Corporation, released in November 2004 after a five-year, $40 million development phase. Acclaimed for its advanced physics, animation, sound, AI, graphics, and narrative, the game won 39 "Game of the Year" awards and the title of "Game of the Decade" at the 2012 Spike Video Game Awards, and is considered one of the most influential, innovative and significant works in the history of vidya gaems. By December 2008, over 6.5 million copies of Half-Life 2 were sold at retail (not including Steam sales), as of February 2011, it had sold over 12 million copies.


 Gordon Freeman is awakened a few years after the events of the prequel by the enigmatic G-Man, to discover that the planet is now under control by the Combine empire, a technological superior alien race whom in seven hours achieved to impose a right-wing dictatorship based on a brutal police state, biologically assimilating any kind of species, and preventing humans to reproduce via a "suppression field". 
Our favorite man graduated from MIT with a PhD in Theoretical Physics has now to join the resistance in an effort to restore the democratic civilization that once was the Earth, although this one does not have a central command structure, there are main figures such as Eli Vance, Barney Calhoun, Arne Magnusson, Alyx Vance, Isaac Kleiner and, obviously, Gordon Freeman.

In brief the core of the plot is a revision of the same chronicle of an outer-space invasion that has been repeated since "The War of the Worlds", but simply because similar stories have been told doesn't discredit this one, proving that you don’t need a complex or intricate history to create a deep narrative. Here, were introduced into a world where we can deconstruct the reality by observing it, we do not have immense dialogues or cinematics, everything is told by the environment. At the beginning no one tells us that totalitarianism is ruling, we got off the train and some robots take pictures of us, we see police officers abusing of poor citizens, ideological propaganda in favor of the current government, and so on; the Bentham's Panopticon is displayed all around for us to create immersion.

What Valve tried to achieve with the prequel, referring to gameplay, here evolved beautifully thanks to the so-famous Source engine, bringing to life a world (almost) totally interactive with the user, with some physics that worked in the most realistic possible ways to imagine at the moment of the release. We can grab trash, bottles, wooden pallets, break the pallets into pieces, move the pieces, throw cans, and all of THIS, precisely, is a really strong component to the immersion of the story (as I said before) that wouldn't be possible in a flat world where the objects that surround us are merely immovable things attached to the floor; AI plays a really important role here too, but I'll talk about this in a review of "HL2: Episode 1" because I think it suits better since the interaction with NPCs is more present.

Nevertheless, Source engine wasn't used only improve the narrative, through the game we have a lot of puzzles that involve physics (like grab some bricks to create a lever in order to reach a higher point), or parts where depending on how we jump, shoot or hide can be very decesive to survive against enemies. If we combine (do you get the joke, hehe, Combine) the phsycs of the moving character in a particular envirovment surrounded by a specific type of enemy reducing the decisions one can make depending on what guns you have and the ammount of ammunition you carry. So, while we are going through Ravenholm (opponents that can't shoot, but are more fast, can climb, have special abilities and work in a different way when they attack you in groups; keep in mind too that at this point of the game we only have certain type of guns) is a tottaly different gameplay than, let's say, Nova Prospekt (this ones will only shoot you, and yes, there are some different kind of Overwatch soldiers but when they're on the offensive they work as a whole in contrast to the zombies whose actions are more individual).

With all of this said, I'm certain that this game, seeing it not as a mere commodity or a simple entertainment but as an artistic expression still young, but for this does not deserve not to be analized as such. Videogames are today something without a solid structure, or at least the developpers are not totally aware of how to translate the depth of other forms of art to this one, but here we got an example on what the future creators can use as a reference to bring to life what one day may become une œuvre d’art, ou un objet d'art, with all the words.

满分十分我给一百分，沉浸式剧情类FPS游戏的神作。一旦开玩就会忍不住一口气打通关。

剧情环环相扣，战斗节奏设置的正好。为数不多与不同激烈程度的BOSS战，更让人感受到随着剧情推进为了自由的人们掀起的革命一波更比一波强。

玩家不会因为无休止的杀戮而感到厌倦，相反却会沉浸在那些有趣的小谜题与不同工具的使用之中。结合恰到好处的地图氛围与少但出彩的配乐，会让玩家全程无比亢奋。横贯全游戏时不时背后出现亦或是突然出现在面前的猎头蟹和僵尸令人防不胜防。某些充满血迹和死尸的房间配合昏暗的光线让人很难想象到底发生过什么。当你小心翼翼的穿过这些地方之后，准备喘口气时，联合军的无线电，僵尸的咆哮亦或是猎头蟹的叫声便映入了你的耳帘...

而地图方面又以莱温霍姆最为出色。将要进入莱温霍姆前从天而降的猎头蟹死尸会让玩家有种不祥的预感，而一边只剩肌肉面部表情狰狞的死尸更是让人不寒而栗。刚进地图玩家便看见了一具吊起来只剩下半身的尸体，配合夜晚昏暗的光线，增添了三分诡谲感。进屋便是被圆锯拦腰截断的僵尸，让玩家不禁提高了警惕。走到窄巷里突然传入耳朵的对话让玩家不禁惊讶这样的地方居然还有活人。当玩家到达前院看见了神父时，他背后门中传来的的光亮让人不禁怀疑是不是遇见了天神。接下来为了和神父见面，玩家又穿过了神父的重重陷阱，终于到达了屋顶与神父面对面。等电梯时远方屋子上高高跃起发出恐怖嚎叫的快速僵尸预示着攻击即将开始...穿过了墓地之后，神父主动帮你断后，伴随着他的阵阵笑声他消失在了火海之中...让人不禁为他的安危捏一把汗。接下来穿过矿井终于看到了外面的曙光之后，音乐响起。想必很多人都会有种如释重负的感觉吧。

作为猎头蟹恐惧症患者的我，克服恐惧开玩。在闯过了恐怖的莱温霍姆，诺瓦矿场，率领反抗军大举反击之后，最终到达了城堡内部。引发了奇点坍塌之后，一切都结束了...一切又仿佛才刚刚开始。

一口气玩完全程之后令人大呼过瘾，个人发自内心认为半条命2真的值得一玩。今天依旧不错的画质向人们证明了V社出品必属精品。重力枪以及撬棍的使用让人不禁感叹V社的天才想法。

总结——完全对得起这个评价:Old but Gold,希望2020年之前V社能够出3。
